titleStmt.title: Arthritology, or, A discourse of the gout written by John Groenevelt.
titleStmt.author: Groeneveld, Joannes, 1647-1710?

notesStmt.note: Includes A pindarick ode on the discourse of the gout and two testimonial letters written by persons afflicted with gout.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
